00022    /*
00023    * Default constructor.
00024    */
00025    PairList::PairList()
00026     :
00027       atom1Ptrs_(),
00028       atom2Ptrs_(),
00029       first_(),
00030       oldPositions_(),
00031       skin_(0.0),
00032       cutoff_(0.0),
00033       atomCapacity_(0),
00034       pairCapacity_(0),
00035       nAtom1_(0),
00036       nAtom2_(0),
00037       nAtom_(0),
00038       tList1_(0),
00039       maxNAtom_(0),
00040       maxNAtom2_(0),
00041       buildCounter_(0)
00042    {}

00044    /*
00045    * Destructor.

00047    PairList::~PairList() 
00048    {}

00050    /*
00051    * Read atomCapacity and pairCapacity from file.
00052    */
00053    void PairList::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00054    {
00055       readBegin(in, "PairList");
00056       read<int>(in, "atomCapacity", atomCapacity_);
00057       read<int>(in, "pairCapacity", pairCapacity_);
00058       read<double>(in, "skin",      skin_);
00059       readEnd(in);
00060    }
00061 
00062    /*
00063    * Allocate CellList and PairList arrays, initialize to empty state.
00064    */
00065    void PairList::allocate(int atomIdEnd, const Boundary& boundary, 
00066                                           double potentialCutoff)
00067    {
00068       int i;
00069 
00070       // Preconditions
00071       if (skin_ < 0.0000001) {
00072          UTIL_THROW("skin must be set before PairList::initialize");
00073       }
00074       if (atomCapacity_ <= 0 ) {
00075          UTIL_THROW("atomCapacity_ must be set before PairList::initialize");
00076       }
00077       if (pairCapacity_ <= 0 ) {
00078          UTIL_THROW("pairCapacity_ must be set before PairList::initialize");
00079       }
00080 
00081       // PairList cutoff = cutoff for potential + a "skin"
00082       cutoff_ = potentialCutoff + skin_;
00083 
00084       // Initialize the private CellList
00085       cellList_.allocate(atomIdEnd, boundary, cutoff_);
00086    
00087       // Allocate neighbor list data structures
00088 
00089       atom1Ptrs_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00090       atom2Ptrs_.allocate(pairCapacity_);
00091       first_.allocate(atomCapacity_ + 1);
00092       oldPositions_.allocate(atomCapacity_);
00093    
00094       // Initialize array elements to null values
00095       for (i=0; i < atomCapacity_; ++i) {
00096          atom1Ptrs_[i] = 0;
00097          first_[i] = PairList::NullIndex;
00098          oldPositions_[i].zero();
00099       }
00100       first_[atomCapacity_] = PairList::NullIndex;
00101       for (i=0; i < pairCapacity_; ++i) {
00102          atom2Ptrs_[i] = 0;
00103       }
00104    
00105    }
00106 
00107    /*
00108    * Make the grid of cells for the internal CellList.
00109    */
00110    void PairList::makeGrid(const Boundary& boundary)
00111    {  cellList_.makeGrid(boundary, cutoff_); }
00112  
00113    /*
00114    * Clear the CellList and PairList.
00115    */
00116    void PairList::clear()
00117    { 
00118       cellList_.clear(); 
00119       nAtom1_   = 0; 
00120       nAtom2_   = 0; 
00121       nAtom_    = 0;
00122       tList1_   = atomCapacity_ - 1;
00123       first_[0] = 0;
00124    }
00125  
00126    /*
00127    * Build the PairList, i.e., populate it with atom pairs.
00128    */
00129    void PairList::build(const Boundary& boundary)
00130    {
00131       CellList::NeighborArray cellNeighbor;
00132       Vector  iPos, jPos;
00133       Atom   *iAtomPtr, *jAtomPtr;
00134       double  dRSq, cutoffSq;
00135       int     nCellNeighbor, nCellAtom, totCells;
00136       int     ic, ip, iAtomId, jp, jAtomId;
00137       bool    foundNeighbor;
00138   
00139       // Precondition
00140       assert(isAllocated());
00141  
00142       // Set maximum squared-separation for pairs in Pairlist
00143       cutoffSq = cutoff_*cutoff_;
00144    
00145       // Initialize counters for primary atoms and neighbors
00146       nAtom1_   = 0; // Number of primary atoms with neighbors
00147       nAtom2_   = 0; // Number of secondary atoms (2nd in pair), or pairs
00148       nAtom_    = 0; // Number of atoms, with or without neighbors
00149       tList1_   = atomCapacity_ - 1;
00150       first_[0] = 0;
00151    
00152       // Loop over cells containing primary atom. ic = cell index
00153       totCells = cellList_.totCells();
00154       for (ic = 0; ic < totCells; ++ic) {
00155    
00156          // Get Array cellNeighbor of Ids of neighbor atoms for cell ic.
00157          // Elements 0,..., nCellAtom - 1 contain Ids for atoms in cell ic.
00158          // Elements nCellAtom,..., nCellNeighbor-1 are from neighboring cells.
00159          cellList_.getCellNeighbors(ic, cellNeighbor, nCellAtom);
00160          nCellNeighbor = cellNeighbor.size();
00161       
00162          // Loop over atoms in cell ic
00163          for (ip = 0; ip < nCellAtom; ++ip) {
00164             iAtomPtr = cellNeighbor[ip]; 
00165             iPos     = iAtomPtr->position();
00166             iAtomId  = iAtomPtr->id();
00167             ++nAtom_;
00168             if (nAtom_ > atomCapacity_) {
00169                UTIL_THROW("Overflow: nAtom_ > atomCapacity_ in PairList");
00170             }
00171    
00172             // Indicate that no neighbors have been found yet
00173             foundNeighbor = false;
00174    
00175             // Loop over atoms in all neighboring cells, including cell ic.
00176             for (jp = 0; jp < nCellNeighbor; ++jp) {
00177                jAtomPtr = cellNeighbor[jp]; 
00178                jPos     = jAtomPtr->position();
00179                jAtomId  = jAtomPtr->id();
00180         
00181                // Avoid double counting: only count pairs with jAtomId > iAtomId
00182                if ( jAtomId > iAtomId ) {
00183      
00184                   // Exclude bonded pairs
00185                   if (!iAtomPtr->mask().isMasked(*jAtomPtr))  {
00186    
00187                      // Calculate distance between atoms i and j
00188                      dRSq = boundary.distanceSq(iPos, jPos);
00189    
00190                      if (dRSq < cutoffSq) {
00191       
00192                         // Check for overflow of atom2Ptrs_
00193                         if (nAtom2_ >= pairCapacity_) {
00194                            UTIL_THROW("Overflow: # pairs > pairCapacity_");
00195                         }
00196       
00197                         // If first_ neighbor, record iAtomId in atom1Ptrs_
00198                         if (!foundNeighbor) {
00199 
00200                            assert(nAtom1_ < atomCapacity_);
00201                            assert(nAtom1_ >= 0);
00202                            assert(tList1_ >= nAtom1_);
00203 
00204                            atom1Ptrs_[nAtom1_] = iAtomPtr;
00205                            oldPositions_[nAtom1_] = iPos;
00206                            foundNeighbor = true;
00207                         }
00208       
00209                         // Append Id of 2nd atom in pair to atom2Ptrs_[]
00210                         assert(tList1_ <  atomCapacity_);
00211                         atom2Ptrs_[nAtom2_] = jAtomPtr;
00212                         ++nAtom2_;
00213       
00214                      }
00215                   }
00216    
00217                } // end if jAtomId > iAtomId
00218          
00219             } // end for jp (j atom)
00220    
00221             if (foundNeighbor) {
00222                // Update counter first_[nAtom1_]
00223                ++nAtom1_;
00224                first_[nAtom1_] = nAtom2_;
00225             } else {
00226                // Add atom with no neighbors to top of atom1Ptrs_ 
00227                assert(tList1_ >= nAtom1_);
00228                assert(tList1_ <  atomCapacity_);
00229                assert(tList1_ >= 0);
00230                atom1Ptrs_[tList1_] = iAtomPtr;
00231                oldPositions_[tList1_] = iPos;
00232                --tList1_;
00233             }
00234          
00235          } // end for ip (i atom)
00236    
00237       } // end for ic (i cell)
00238 
00239       // Increment buildCounter_= number of times the list has been built.
00240       ++buildCounter_;
00241  
00242       // Increment maximum
00243       if (nAtom_  > maxNAtom_)  maxNAtom_  = nAtom_;
00244       if (nAtom2_ > maxNAtom2_) maxNAtom2_ = nAtom2_;
00245      
00246    }
00247 
00248    /*
00249    * Initialize a pair iterator.
00250    */
00251    void PairList::begin(PairIterator& iterator) const
00252    {
00253       iterator.atom1Ptrs_ = &atom1Ptrs_[0];
00254       iterator.atom2Ptrs_ = &atom2Ptrs_[0];
00255       iterator.first_     = &first_[0];
00256       iterator.nAtom1_    = nAtom1_;
00257       iterator.nAtom2_    = nAtom2_;
00258       iterator.atom1Id_   = 0;
00259       iterator.atom2Id_   = 0;
00260    }
00261 
00262    
00263    /*
00264    * Return false if any atom has moved a distance greater than skin/2,
00265    * or if the PairList has never been built. Return true otherwise.
00266    */
00267    bool PairList::isCurrent(const Boundary& boundary) const
00268    {
00269       // Precondition
00270       assert(isAllocated());
00271  
00272       double dRSq, dRSqMax;
00273       int    ip;
00274   
00275       // If the list has never been built, it is not current. 
00276       if (buildCounter_ == 0) return false;
00277    
00278       dRSqMax = 0.25*skin_*skin_;
00279 
00280       // Loop over atoms with neighbors (increment from bottom)
00281       for (ip = 0; ip < nAtom1_; ++ip) {
00282          dRSq = boundary.distanceSq(atom1Ptrs_[ip]->position(), 
00283                                     oldPositions_[ip]);
00284          if (dRSq > dRSqMax) {
00285             return false;
00286          }
00287       }
00288    
00289       // Loop over atoms with no neighbors (decrement from top)
00290       for (ip = atomCapacity_ - 1; ip > tList1_; --ip) {
00291          dRSq = boundary.distanceSq(atom1Ptrs_[ip]->position(), 
00292                                     oldPositions_[ip]);
00293          if (dRSq > dRSqMax) {
00294             return false;
00295          }
00296       }
00297 
00298       return true;
00299    }
00300 
00301    /*
00302    * Clear all statistics.
00303    */
00304    void PairList::clearStatistics()
00305    {
00306       maxNAtom_     = 0;
00307       maxNAtom2_    = 0;
00308       buildCounter_ = 0;
00309    }

00311 
00312    /*
00313    * Return true if valid, or throw Exception.
00314    */
00315    bool PairList::isValid() const
00316    {
00317       if (isAllocated()) {
00318 
00319          // Check for null pointers to allocated arrays
00320 
00321          if (atomCapacity_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("atomCapacity_ <= 0"); 
00322          if (pairCapacity_ <= 0) UTIL_THROW("atomCapacity_ <= 0"); 
00323 
00324          //if (atom1Ptrs_ == 0)    UTIL_THROW("Null atom1Ptrs_"); 
00325          //if (atom2Ptrs_ == 0)    UTIL_THROW("Null atom2Ptrs_"); 
00326          //if (first_ == 0)        UTIL_THROW("Null first_"); 
00327          //if (oldPositions_ == 0) UTIL_THROW("Null oldPositions_"); 
00328 
00329          if (nAtom_ > 0) {
00330             if (nAtom_ != nAtom1_ + atomCapacity_ - 1 -  tList1_) {
00331                UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent innAtom_, nAtom1_, tList1");
00332             }
00333             cellList_.isValid(nAtom_);
00334             if (nAtom_ != cellList_.nAtom()) {
00335                UTIL_THROW("Inconsistent values of nAtom_");
00336             }
00337          } else 
00338          if (nAtom_ == 0) {
00339             if (nAtom1_ != 0) UTIL_THROW("nAtom_ ==0 and nAtom1 != 0");
00340             if (nAtom2_ != 0) UTIL_THROW("nAtom_ ==0 and nAtom2 != 0");
00341             cellList_.isValid();
00342          } else {
00343             UTIL_THROW("nAtom_ < 0");
00344          }
00345       }
00346 
00347       return true; 
00348    }
